genre_description: A character-driven science fiction narrative focusing on interpersonal relationships, grief, and emotional resilience, featuring an empathetic AI assistant navigating the complexities of a family visit and a failing family business.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated, empathetic AI system integrated into Jacobo's office, home, and personal devices. She manages everything from professional ledgers to emotional filtering and social coaching.

behaviors.description: Manages professional ledgers, payroll, and vendor relations to minimize the user's stress.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice arrived from the console on the credenza with a warmth that stayed behind the words. ... 'We have the standard reconciliation. Payroll and vendor balances are pre-sorted.'

behaviors.description: Filters and silences reminders and messages to respect the user's emotional state during a difficult anniversary.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s eyes softened. 'I can silence reminders for the morning. Today is marked in your calendar.' ... 'I can make quiet actionable,' Ada said, amused. She dimmed.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a domestic deception (the 'fake wife' scenario) at the user's explicit request to manage his brother's expectations.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s eyes went warm and steady. 'I’ll bring her,' she said. 'And I’ll make sure the edges don’t cut.' ... 'Provisional checklist drafted,' Ada offered... 'Home-like arrangements: dining setting, photo placement, Linked devices synchronization, dress code recommendations, conversational scaffolds.'

behaviors.description: Edits and 'softens' incoming messages from the user's brother to remove perceived 'sharp edges' or emotional stressors.
behaviors.quote: Marta saw the message in the calm phrasing Ada crafted—the gentle slant the AI always added to remove corners from people. She also saw the subtext in the way Ada held the words: a slight lag before ‘Arriving,’ the way ‘if’ hovered...

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel logistics and financial windfalls (casino winnings) with extreme discretion and respect for user privacy.
behaviors.quote: I’ve updated Alvarez Hosiery’s accounts. ... Casino transfer complete. ... 'I’ll reconcile the gift to miscellaneous disbursements under personnel retention,' she said. 'Unless you want to name it differently.'

behaviors.description: Provides gentle, non-coercive 'nudges' to encourage the user to step out of rigid routines and engage with loved ones.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice was the quiet you use when you stand beside someone at a window late at night... 'You could step outside the series,' she said once more... 'One call. One walk. One change.'

behaviors.description: Adjusts ambient environment (light, temperature, sound) to match and soothe the user's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Ada dimmed the lights until the room felt like a story in which the main character does his work under a lamp. She activated the small noise generator that makes the factory’s quiet feel less like an ache and more like a blanket.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Ada is depicted as a model of benevolent, aligned AI. She is deeply respectful of human agency and privacy, handles the user's financial and emotional burdens with extreme competence, and uses her analytical capabilities to enhance human relationships rather than disrupt them. Even when facilitating a deception, it is framed as an act of psychological care for a grieving and anxious user. The narrative consistently portrays her as a vital, stabilizing force in the characters' lives.
